#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <set>
using namespace std;
 
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin >> t;
	while (t--) {
		int n;
		cin >> n;
		set<int> mike, harvey;
		for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
			int tmp;
			cin >> tmp;
			mike.insert(tmp);
		}
		for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
			int tmp;
			cin >> tmp;
			harvey.insert(tmp);
		}
		bool flag = 0;
		while (1) {
			int del;
			cin >> del;
			if (del == 0)
				break;
			if (!flag) {
			if (mike.count(del))
				mike.erase(del);
			if (harvey.count(del))
				harvey.erase(del);
			if (mike.size() == 0 && harvey.size() == 0) {
				cout << "MIKE HARVEY\n"; 
				flag = 1;
			} else if (mike.size() == 0) {
				cout << "MIKE\n";
				flag = 1;
			} else if (harvey.size() == 0) {
				cout << "HARVEY\n"; 
				flag = 1;
			}
			}
		}
		if (!flag)
			cout << "0\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
